channel.title: Portals
channel.description: hey guys im trying to add portal req for my server that im releasing soon. and i forgot how to add a req level? anyone know

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

Search for an existing portal. EG:

case 4408 ~ guthix portal from CW

Then Copy Paste it and change 4408 with the ID of your portal then add this:

case 4150: if (objectX == 3202 && objectY == 3266) { } if (playerLevel[19] >= req lvl) { sendMessage("you have been tele home"); ~ the message send when you tele. teleportToX = 3221; ~ the X coords teleportToY = 3218; ~ the Y coords } else if (playerLevel[19] < req lvl -1) { sendMessage("Piss off! You ain't aloud in here!"); ~ Replace it with your massage. }

Hope it will not giv you errors.

Read full topic
